Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9 /_.:=+@-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9 /_.:=+@-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CpuSize.description: Per worker CPU resource. vCPU is the only supported unit and specifying vCPU is optional.
CpuSize.markdownDescription:
Per worker CPU resource. vCPU is the only supported unit and specifying vCPU is optional.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 15  
Pattern: ^[1-9][0-9]*(\s)?(vCPU|vcpu|VCPU)?$  
Update requires: No interruption

MemorySize.description: Per worker memory resource. GB is the only supported unit and specifying GB is optional.
MemorySize.markdownDescription:
Per worker memory resource. GB is the only supported unit and specifying GB is optional.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 15  
Pattern: ^[1-9][0-9]*(\s)?(GB|gb|gB|Gb)?$  
Update requires: No interruption

DiskSize.markdownDescription:

---

Required: No

Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 15  
Pattern: ^[1-9][0-9]*(\s)?(GB|gb|gB|Gb)$  
Update requires: No interruption
